channel.title: How Can I manage the Pk Point shop?
channel.description:
I have a Pk Point shop and I don't know how to change how many points needed to get the item.
I said you need 505k Pk points to buy, And I don't know how to change it to like 10 Pk Points?

item.title: How Can I manage the Pk Point shop?
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

Add me on MSN and I’ll help you.

Jeffreh@live.com

Read full topic
